channel.title: Client interface icons
channel.description:
Heya, my problem is, that when i say edit a skill icon, the firemaking one for instance. I compile etc, and it works. But ive tried to remove the summoning icon , and replace it with a clanchat icon from my other server. But it doesnt show up? It still shows the summoning icon, even when ive compiled etc. When i go onto the file ive edited, it shows the new icon , not the summoning one.
Ive tried just editing a different icon like changing the colour , that appeared but the background to it , changed from transparent to black.
So my questions are
-How can I make my new icon show? -How do I make my icons backgrounds transparent.
Im using ms paint btw, i dont know if its possible.

item.title: Client interface icons
item.dc:creator: @f_ur_y f ur y
item.description:
@f_ur_y wrote:

You can use Adobe Fireworks to make transparent images.

btw, the image has to be a .png for the transparent to save.

Read full topic

item.title: Client interface icons
